citations.narrative:
One shih tzu puppy born 16-July-2023 is housed with 3 dogs over 4 months old that are not it's dam or foster dam.
Housing puppies with adult dogs that are not their dam or foster dam may result in injuries due to incompatibility.
Puppies under 4 months of age or less may not be housed in the same primary enclosure with adult dogs other than their
dams or foster dams. The puppies mentioned above must be either housed with other puppies under 4 months of age or
less or their dam or foster dam.
The puppy was moved into an enclosure with other puppies at the time of inspection.
To be corrected by: 2-November-2023
This is a 1st Relicense Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
Applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 31-December-2023 or the Applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Relicense Inspection.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
n

narrative:
3.7(c) 
   
Compatible grouping. 
One shih tzu puppy born 16-July-2023 is housed with 3 dogs over 4 months old that are not it's dam or foster dam. 
Housing puppies with adult dogs that are not their dam or foster dam may result in injuries due to incompatibility. 
Puppies under 4 months of age or less may not be housed in the same primary enclosure with adult dogs other than their 
dams or foster dams. The puppies mentioned above must be either housed with other puppies under 4 months of age or 
less or their dam or foster dam. 
The puppy was moved into an enclosure with other puppies at the time of inspection. 
To be corrected by: 2-November-2023 
 
This is a 1st Relicense Inspection for a Class “A” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
Applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 31-December-2023 or the Applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Relicense Inspection. 
 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
 
 n
